syntax.GenericSyntaxError: A syntax error occurred in your code.
syntax.InvalidAssignmentTargetExpression: Invalid assignment target. You can only assign to variables.
syntax.MissingBacktickToTerminateTemplateLitera: Missing closing backtick '`' to terminate template literal.
syntax.MissingDoubleQuoteToTerminateString: Did you forget to add end quote?
syntax.MissingInitializerInVariableDeclaration: Missing initializer in variable declaration. You must provide a value when declaring a variable with 'let'.
syntax.MissingRightBraceAfterBlock: Missing closing brace '}' after block statement.
syntax.MissingRightBraceInTemplateLiteral: Missing closing brace '}' in template literal interpolation.
syntax.MissingRightBracketInArray: Missing closing bracket ']' to close the list.
syntax.MissingRightBracketInMemberAccess: Missing closing bracket ']' after array index.
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterIfCondition: Missing closing parenthesis ')' after if condition.
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterFunctionCall: Did you forget the closing parenthesis ')' when calling the {{function}} function?
syntax.MissingSemicolon: Missing semicolon ';' at end of statement.
syntax.MissingVariableName: Missing variable name in declaration. You must provide a name after 'let'.
syntax.MultipleStatementsPerLine: Multiple statements found on line {{line}}. Only one statement per line is allowed when oneStatementPerLine is enabled.
syntax.TrailingCommaInArray: Trailing commas are not allowed in lists.
syntax.TrailingCommaInDictionary: Trailing commas are not allowed in objects.
syntax.InvalidDictionaryKey: Invalid object key. Keys must be identifiers, strings, or numbers.
syntax.MissingRightBraceInDictionary: Missing closing brace '}' to close the object.
syntax.UnimplementedToken: The '{{lexeme}}' feature is not yet implemented.
syntax.UnterminatedComment: Unterminated comment. Multi-line comments must be closed with '*/'.
syntax.UnterminatedString: Did you forget to add end quote?
syntax.NestedFunctionDeclaration: Function declarations are only allowed at the top level, not inside blocks or other functions.
syntax.MissingLeftParenthesisAfterFunctionName: Missing opening parenthesis '(' after function name.
syntax.MissingParameterName: Missing parameter name in function declaration.
syntax.DuplicateParameterName: Duplicate parameter name '{{name}}' in function declaration.
syntax.MissingRightParenthesisAfterParameters: Missing closing parenthesis ')' after function parameters.
syntax.MissingLeftBraceBeforeFunctionBody: Missing opening brace '{' before function body.
syntax.BreakStatementNotAllowed: Break statements are not allowed at your current learning level.
syntax.ContinueStatementNotAllowed: Continue statements are not allowed at your current learning level.

runtime.IndexOutOfRange: Index {{index}} is out of range. Array has {{length}} elements.
runtime.PropertyNotFound: Property '{{property}}' does not exist on arrays.
runtime.ShadowingDisabled: Variable shadowing is disabled. The variable '{{name}}' is already declared in an outer scope.
runtime.TruthinessDisabled: Only boolean values are allowed in conditions, but got '{{value}}'.
runtime.VariableNotDeclared: The variable '{{name}}' has not been declared.
runtime.ReturnOutsideFunction: You used the 'return' keyword, but you're not inside a function. Return statements can only be used inside functions.
runtime.BreakOutsideLoop: You used the 'break' keyword, but you're not inside a loop. Break statements can only be used inside for or while loops.
runtime.ContinueOutsideLoop: You used the 'continue' keyword, but you're not inside a loop. Continue statements can only be used inside for or while loops.
runtime.ForOfLoopTargetNotIterable: The for...of loop requires an iterable value (like an array or string), but you provided a {{type}} with value {{value}}.
runtime.MethodNotYetImplemented: The method '{{method}}' exists but has not been implemented yet. It will be available in a future version.
runtime.MethodNotYetAvailable: The method '{{method}}' is not available at your current learning level. Keep progressing to unlock this feature!
runtime.NonJikiObjectDetectedInExecution: Internal error: Expected a JikiObject but received {{receivedType}}: {{receivedValue}}. This is a bug in the interpreter.
runtime.MaxIterationsReached: Your code ran for too long and was stopped to prevent an infinite loop. The maximum number of iterations allowed is {{max}}.
